document.full_text: attacks on libya are likely to slow in the coming days, a u.s. general said on monday, as western powers consolidate a no-fly zone that some say is unlikely to bring an early end to the country's civil war.
document.title: strikes on libya set to slow, stalemate feared
lines_and_colors: attacks on libya are likely to slow in the coming days, a u.s. general said on monday, as western powers consolidate a no-fly zone that some say is unlikely to bring an early end to the country's civil war.
